rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {APY1910, BHS1320, BHS1340, GSC1306, GSC1307, PSS1711, PSS1712, PSY1022, WEL1320, WEL1340}

description: The unit provides a further introduction to the behavioural science of psychology. Topics include social psychology; organisational/industrial psychology; psychopathology; basic processes and principles of cognition; descriptive statistics and an introduction to inferential statistics. Laboratory classes augment students' understanding of the lecture material and provide training in research techniques.
